name: MLP Name Generator
description: Unleash your inner pony! Create magical, memorable MLP-inspired names with our generator. Perfect for fan fiction, role-playing, or just plain fun!
introduction: Ever dreamt of galloping through Equestria with a name that truly sparkles? Our MLP Name Generator is here to sprinkle some magic into your life! Whether you're crafting a new fanfic character, naming your gaming avatar, or simply indulging in some pony-powered creativity, we've got you covered. Get ready to discover names that are as unique and enchanting as the ponies themselves!
howToUse: 1. Giddy up! No seriously, just scroll down. It's easier than training a Fluttershy!
2. Click the 'Generate' button. It's like magic, but with less horn-sparkle.
3. Behold! A brand new, totally awesome MLP name appears!
4. Don't like it? No problem! Click again for endless possibilities. We've got more names than Pinkie Pie has cupcakes!
5. Found the perfect name? Copy it, share it, and let your pony pride shine!

faqs.question: Is this generator really free?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! It's as free as a bird soaring through the Everfree Forest (but hopefully less scary!).

faqs.question: Can I use these names for commercial purposes?
faqs.answer: While we encourage creativity, these names are best suited for personal use, fan projects, and general pony-loving fun. We're not responsible for any copyright claims if you start selling Rainbow Dash-branded shampoo!

faqs.question: How many names can I generate?
faqs.answer: As many as your heart desires! The possibilities are as endless as the fields of Ponyville.

faqs.question: Are the names generated completely random?
faqs.answer: We use a blend of classic MLP naming conventions, character traits, and a dash of pure magic to create names that feel authentic and unique.

faqs.question: Can I suggest new prefixes or suffixes for the generator?
faqs.answer: We'd love to hear your ideas! Feel free to reach out to us with your suggestions. We're always looking for ways to make our generator even more awesome!

faqs.question: Will the generator create cutie marks too?
faqs.answer: Sadly, no. We're name wizards, not cutie mark crafters! But hey, that's part of the fun – you get to imagine the perfect cutie mark for your newly named pony!
